title: My acc was banned for no reason
body:
My account was banned without a message or nothing, I wasn't toxic at all and never got a ban before.
This is my first time and was permanent for some reason that idk.
Please help.

replies.body: It looks like someone issued a [**chargeback **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334-Chargebacks)on some of the purchases made from this account, so that money was refunded while the account is locked pending repayment. Hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to start the process of lifting this suspension.
Send a ticket to Riot Support.

Please riot if you see my coment just asnwer my question.I did get perma banned and i have spend a LOT of money at this acc and i want back(please) at my new acc or with money , i dint work hard to lose them like that {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}  please let me know your opinion or answer riot(if you can tell to a greek rioter talk with me). my email is bgkellas123@gmail.com
